front.title: Learning the IPv6 Prefix of a NAT64

abstract.t: In some IPv6/IPv4 translation scenarios it is necessary for an IPv6 host to know the IPv6 prefix used by its NAT64. In some of the IPv6/ IPv4 translation proposals, the prefix is not fixed; that is, the prefix is chosen by the network operator. This specification provides two methods for a host learn its NAT64's IPv6 prefix and length.
